falsificationAttempts.description: Verified that evidence binding and scoring always reference the experiment-wide evidence set.
falsificationAttempts.result: `bindExperimentEvidence` slices the batch by `experiment.config.scoring_stage.evidence_cap`, and `experiments_scoring_seed_requests` reads the bound `experiment_evidence` set without rerunning per run, so no per-run evidence subset exists today.

notes: Evidence binding is unequivocally tied to the experiment record, leaving no contradictory implementation that re-slices evidence per run; the hypothesis holds.
